folder.name: setup for  dedicated sql pool for test  bank data

content.query:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- D.  MASTER KEY + OPEN (required for DB SCOPED CREDENTIAL)
--     Create master key once, then open in session for credential creation.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 1) create master key if not exists (run as db_owner)
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.symmetric_keys WHERE name = '##MS_DatabaseMasterKey##')
BEGIN
    -- << replace password with a strong one >>
    CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'avi@21Priyanka';
    PRINT 'Database Master Key created';
END
ELSE
    PRINT 'Database Master Key already exists';
GO

-- 2) open master key in this session (session-scoped)
OPEN MASTER KEY DECRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'avi@21Priyanka';
GO
